description: Working on automating regulatory compliance for retail banks using agentic AI and Purple Fabric, Intellect's agentic AI platform

Delivered a fraud detection and triaging solution on the Purple Fabric, Intellect's agentic AI platform, within two weeks, which has already been demoed to 7 clients. Used agentic AI to speed up operational processes for retail banking clients.

Co-created ClearFi, contributing to 50% of frontend (Nextjs) and around 10% of backend (Node js and GraphQL) code which is now live. Improved product strategy and planning process for PMs by creating a dashboard in two days, using webhooks(JavaScript) and Looker Studio for analyzing feedback and product usage data. Improved data entry process for the BAs by more than 300% by creating an in-house Content Management System using Nextjs within 5 weeks.
Created a blockchain POC using DAML after learning it within 1 month.
Wrote 23 educational articles in one month on topics related to PyTorch for publishing on the company website. Built deep learning models using MNIST, FashionMNIST and CIFAR datasets.
